deployable_transformations.author: Relevance AI
deployable_transformations.name: Generate Audio from text with Bark
deployable_transformations.description: Bark is a transformer-based text-to-audio model created by Suno. Bark can generate highly realistic, multilingual speech as well as other audio - including music, background noise and simple sound effects. The model can also produce nonverbal communications like laughing, sighing and crying with [laughter], [laughs].
